verbs.description: [ARG0: Canadian immigration authorities] , [V: facing] [ARG1: an influx of asylum seekers from Nigeria] , are asking United States immigration officials to enhance their enforcement of existing U.S. immigration laws . The Washington Post outlined the growing immigration problem Canada is facing — which the Canadian government partially blames on the U.S. — and what they want done about it . What are the details ? According to the Post , since the political environment for refugees is becoming more hostile under President Donald Trump , those seeking refuge in the West are abusing the U.S. visa system . For example , Nigerians seeking refuge in Canada have been requesting temporary U.S. tourist visas only to walk across the Canadian border before their visas expire . It began last summer , Canadian authorities said , when they saw an influx of Haitians walking into Canada via a border crossing in northern New York . However , more recently , it has been Nigerians , who possess temporary U.S. tourist visas , walking into Canada where …
